1st Class Air Conditioned Saloon

Luxury awaits in our 1st Class Air Conditioned Saloon. Enjoy air-conditioned comfort with adjustable cushion seats, foldable armrests, and footrests. Features include tray tables, bottle holders, a few shared TVs, and charging ports for a premium travel experience.

2nd Class Reserved Seats

Comfortable leather seats with foldable armrests and tray tables await you in our 2nd Class. Enjoy the view through windows that can be opened for fresh air, all at a reasonable price. It's the perfect choice for those seeking comfort and affordability.

3rd Class Reserved Seats

Affordable and practical, our 3rd Class offers basic seating with a shared table for groups and openable windows for a refreshing journey. Perfect for budget-conscious travelers seeking essential comfort and convenience.
